events.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

Sparks fly as the explosives you laced around the door to IG-88's command center detonate. Laser fire blasts through the opening, and you duck into cover.

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 black die).

eventActions.tbText: After laying down some suppressing fire, you are able to gain some ground into the center. Through the smoke and blaster fire, you are surprised to see IG-88 in the wave of guards. If you can take him out quickly, this job might even prove to be easy.
{-} Green Imperial mission tokens represent IG units. IG units do not have the abilities "Arsenal" and "Assault" that <color="red">IG-88</color> has.

eventActions.bonuses:
FOCUS ON THE KILL: Discard all Harmful conditions from this figure, or, if it has no harmful conditions, it becomes <color="red">Focused</color> instead. Then, it moves 2 toward the closest Rebel.
BLAZE OF GLORY: At the end of this activation, this figure moves 1 to attack a Rebel with 1 yellow and 1 red die. Apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results. Then, if this figure performed this attack, it suffers 3 {H}.
eventActions.abilities: Relentless: When you declare an attack targeting a figure within 3 spaces, that figure suffers 1 {C}.
eventActions.customText:
{Q} Move 1 to attack {R1} within 3 spaces with 1 red and 1 yellow die.
{Q} Move 1 to attack {R1} within 2 spaces with 1 red and 1 yellow die.
{Q} Move 5 to attack {R1} within 3 spaces with 1 red and 1 yellow die.
{A} Move 1 to reposition 2.
{A} Move 9 to reposition 2.

eventActions.tbText:
You start blasting the guards, trying to move deeper into the command center.

{-} The mission will progress when a door is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

eventActions.shortText: Move deeper into the command center.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Green Imperial mission tokens represent IG units. IG units do not have the abilities "Arsenal" and "Assault" that <color="red">IG-88</color> has.
{-} Doors are locked. A Rebel figure can attack a door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 black die).
{-} The mission will progress when a door is destroyed.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText:
"You cannot stop the inevitable," IG-88 hisses at you in a rasping, mechanical voice as he retreats. "We are your superiors. The day is coming soon when we will take our rightful place as masters of this galaxy!"

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 200 credits per hero.

Droids circle around you, threatening as more IG units advance. All you can do is blast through the wall of mechanical bodies and retreat.

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} The Empire receives <color="red">IG-88</color> (Assassin Droid) as a villain.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.
The door collapses into rubble and splinters. Security systems malfunction, and the second door slides open, too. Behind lies a small, dimly lit room.

translatedEntityProperties.theText:
A security door leads deeper into IG-88's base.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 black die).

A security door leads deeper into IG-88's base.

{-} The door is locked. A Rebel figure can attack the door (Health: *2*, Defense: 1 black die).

eventActions.tbText: Another IG unit swivels its optical sensors in your direction.

eventActions.bonuses:
FOCUS ON THE KILL: Discard all Harmful conditions from this figure, or, if it has no harmful conditions, it becomes <color="red">Focused</color> instead. Then, it moves 2 toward the closest Rebel.
BLAZE OF GLORY: At the end of this activation, this figure moves 1 to attack a Rebel with 1 yellow and 1 red die. Apply +2 Accuracy to the attack results. Then, if this figure performed this attack, it suffers 3 {H}.
eventActions.abilities: Relentless: When you declare an attack targeting a figure within 3 spaces, that figure suffers 1 {C}.
eventActions.customText:
{Q} Move 1 to attack {R1} within 3 spaces with 1 red and 1 yellow die.
{Q} Move 1 to attack {R1} within 2 spaces with 1 red and 1 yellow die.
{Q} Move 5 to attack {R1} within 3 spaces with 1 red and 1 yellow die.
{A} Move 1 to reposition 2.
{A} Move 9 to reposition 2.

eventActions.tbText: More of IG-88's allies storm in.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Green Imperial mission tokens represent IG units. IG units do not have the abilities "Arsenal" and "Assault" that <color="red">IG-88</color> has.
{-} The mission will progress at the end of the Round.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.

events.eventText: A third IG unit walks through the door with armored plating and a massive blaster rifle. He looks in your direction, his mechanical eyes glowing bright red.

eventActions.tbText:
{-} <color="red">IG-88</color>'s "Relentless" ability also causes the target to suffer 1 {H}.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">IG-88</color> and both IG units have been defeated.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Green Imperial mission tokens represent IG units. IG units do not have the abilities "Arsenal" and "Assault" that <color="red">IG-88</color> has.
{-} <color="red">IG-88</color>'s "Relentless" ability also causes the target to suffer 1 {H}.
{-} The Rebels win when <color="red">IG-88</color> and both IG units have been defeated.
{-} The Rebels lose when all heroes are wounded.
